'''Silapna''' are "gates" used to travel between the real and dream worlds. They are activated by playing "Rhythm of the Great Dream" on the [[Vintage Lyre]]. Some [[Aranara]], [[Enemy|Enemies]], and [[Item]]s are only found in the dream world, such as [[Viparyas]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Rhythm of the Great Dream}}

==Locations==
There are three Silapna in [[Dharma Forest]]:
* In [[Vanarana (Subarea)|Vanarana]] near the [[Phantasmal Gate]], encountered during {{Quest|The World of Aranara}}
* In the [[Grove of Dreams]], encountered during {{Quest|Slumbering Roots}}
* In the underground of the [[Ashavan Realm]], encountered during {{Quest|Legends of the Stone Lock}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The Aranara term "Silapna" may be derived from the Sanskrit words {{Lang|''śilā''|sa=शिला|sa_tl=stone}} and {{Lang|''svápna''|sa=स्वप्न|sa_tl=dream}}.
